lead_paragraph: The shot was so risky that Jordan Spieth's caddie practically begged him not to try it Thursday in the Masters.

headline.main: Spieth's Gamble Pays Off on No. 11 at Masters
headline.print_headline: Spieth's Gamble Pays Off on No. 11 at Masters

snippet: The shot was so risky that Jordan Spieth's caddie practically begged him not to try it Thursday in the Masters....
